parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

description: A pop up dialog that offers a selection. Is automatically disposed when closed.

title.description: The title of the action sheet.

message.description: A descriptive message for the available actions.

actions.description: An array of objects describing the actions to be displayed. Each action must have a title and it can also have an image. Actions with the style `cancel` or `destructive` are displayed in a special way.

jsxProperties.description: When using JSX with TypeScript (`.tsx` files), the type of this property determines which JSX attributes are valid for this widget.

[JSX.jsxFactory].description: This function is called by the framework to create JSX elements from the WidgetCollection class.

close.description: Fired when the action sheet was closed.

index.description: The index of the selected action.

select.description: Fired when an action was selected.
